imdb.plot outline: Kofi Kingston is excitement personified. With boundless enthusiasm he dazzles the WWE Universe each week with an explosive combination of frenetic energy and jaw-dropping athleticism. The Ghana native has soared to multiple Intercontinental, United States and WWE Tag Team Title reigns, all with a beaming smile on his face. Now with this special collection focusing on the Boom Squad leader, enjoy some of the most daring, death-defying and definitive matches of his career, including three heart-pounding ladder matches guaranteed to amaze.
imdb.title: WWE Superstar Collection Kofi Kingston
akas: WWE Superstar Collection Kofi Kingston (United States)
plot: Kofi Kingston is excitement personified. With boundless enthusiasm he dazzles the WWE Universe each week with an explosive combination of frenetic energy and jaw-dropping athleticism. The Ghana native has soared to multiple Intercontinental, United States and WWE Tag Team Title reigns, all with a beaming smile on his face. Now with this special collection focusing on the Boom Squad leader, enjoy some of the most daring, death-defying and definitive matches of his career, including three heart-pounding ladder matches guaranteed to amaze.
